title: Release Product from Quality Hold
description: A batch of products was held for inspection and has now been cleared. A quality technician needs to release it for shipment.

tasks.description: Locate the inventory batch that is on 'Quality Hold'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct batch in the inventory system.

tasks.description: Verify that the associated inspection record is complete and has a 'Pass' status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the inspection was passed and all data is entered.

tasks.description: Change the inventory status from 'Quality Hold' to 'Available' or 'Finished Good'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the inventory status, making it available for allocation to orders.
